faq.question: How many PDFs can I upload at once?
faq.answer: Starter plan: 10 PDFs. Pro plan: 50 PDFs. Team plan: 100 PDFs per batch. You can run multiple batches back-to-back.

faq.question: How long does batch processing take?
faq.answer: Processing speed depends on document size and count. Typically: 10 docs = 5 min, 50 docs = 15 min, 100 docs = 30 min. All processed in parallel.

faq.question: Can I apply different settings to each document?
faq.answer: Yes! After upload, you can customize summary type, detail level, and other settings for individual documents before processing.

faq.question: What happens if one document fails?
faq.answer: Other documents continue processing normally. Failed documents appear in your dashboard where you can retry them with one click.

faq.question: Can I upload folders to maintain organization?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Upload entire folders and we'll preserve the folder structure in your library. Great for project organization.

faq.question: Is batch upload available on the free plan?
faq.answer: Free plan supports uploading 1 document at a time. Batch upload is available on Starter, Pro, and Team plans.

faq.question: Can I export all summaries from a batch at once?
faq.answer: Yes! Use batch export to download all summaries as individual files (ZIP) or combined into one document.
